channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Well Im working on a typing terror script. It will be not be acurate but it will click next lvl and stuff. I need help starting it. So
program TypingTerror; begin repeat sendkeyssilent('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz') until(false) end.
So I forgot some commands like clickmouse and color commands. So may anyone help by posting some commands?

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

Yeah. And like Arkanor showed… If you really was trying to make a procedure, you gotta use end; to end procedures. And end. to end whole program, just like I said already.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Monkmonk693 Monkmonk693
item.description:
@Monkmonk693 wrote:

Your script was good except you don’t put a true in the MoveMouseSmooth code, just in the ClickMouse one.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Bwaha! Wrong. He wants to make a procedure, not a new script. Thus, it should be

procedure Name;
begin
//code here
end;

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

No… Thats not working. It should be like, this:

program Startgame;
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(238, 417);
ClickMouse(238, 417, True);
end.

end. is for ending the whole PROGRAM. Not just procedure(s). So if you have end. (and you have to have it because otherwise the script wont work. You will always need first the program and theprogramsname; to make a working script. Without program and end. your program not going to work. Simple :)) you need program too.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @snake60025 snake60025
item.description:
@snake60025 wrote:

Yes ok i did but i need help again lol. Did ido this right?

procedure Startgame;
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(238, 417, true);
ClickMouse(238, 417, True);
end.[br][size=1]Posted at: March 25, 2006, 08:45:55 am[/size][hr]Lol star log onto msn and add snake60025 to msn list

item.title: Need help

item.description:
@snake60025 wrote:

Well Im working on a typing terror script. It will be not be acurate but it will click next lvl and stuff. I need help starting it. So

program TypingTerror;
begin
repeat
sendkeyssilent(‘abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz’)
until(false)
end.

So I forgot some commands like clickmouse and color commands. So may anyone help by posting some commands?
